Miles Sound System SDK 6.1c

Q:

How do I stream a file off a hard disk or CD?

A:

To stream a digital sound off the disk, follow these steps:

1) Open the file to stream with AIL_open_stream.

2) Play the stream with AIL_start_stream.

Next Topic (How do I play a track off a CD?)

Previous Topic (How do I play an XMIDI file with a DLS instrument set?)


Group: FAQs and How Tos
Related Functions: AIL_open_stream, AIL_start_stream
